<template>
  <body class="home">
    
  </body>
  
</template>


<style> 

  body.home {
    background-image: url(C:\Users\Arthur\Desktop\Arthur\AssetsWeb\fundo.jpg);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size:100%;
    bottom: 0;
    color: black;
    left: 0;
    overflow: auto;
    padding: 3em;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    text-align: center;
    top: 0;
  }

  .btn {
    margin: 5px;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 16px;
  }

</style>
